title: Go Tell It On the Mountain kitchen details

content.question: In the middle of the final paragraph, the details in the description of the kitchen (“The room was narrow . . . windows to dry”) most clearly emphasize

choices.label: John’s sense of being overcrowded by living with so many family members
John’s feeling that he is the only person who does any work around the home
John’s affection for his home despite the family’s humble circumstances
the family’s constant but futile efforts to keep their home and its contents clean

content.answer: the family’s constant but futile efforts to keep their home and its contents clean

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
